element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm computes diversity metrics as defined in the FRAGSTATS software package

element.name: ADDITIONAL_INFO
element.text: *http://www.umass.edu/landeco/research/fragstats/fragstats.html *McGarigal, K., and B. J. Marks. 1995. FRAGSTATS: spatial pattern analysis program for quantifying landscape structure. USDA For. Serv. Gen. Tech. Rep. PNW-351.

element.name: INPUT
element.text: the origin raster layer. Should be a categorical layer.

element.name: MAX
element.text: The number of different classes in the raster layer
